name: Shenlong
description:
Shenlong
Shenlong is a game where you play as a dragon and try to destroy as many outposts as possible!

Gameplay
The game takes inspiration from the classic snake: Only your head is vulnerable and you must try to avoid hitting the screen edges, yourself and in this case arrows as well. Destroy as much of everything as you can to grow your dragon and achieve a higher score.

Controls
Hold spacebar to turn counter-clockwise, otherwise you'll move clockwise by default. Press escape mid-game to  The menu can be navigated with W, S and spacebar / up, down and enter.

Credits
Shenlong was mady by Jesse Kettmann and Luuk van den Hoven for the eighth Bored Pixels Jam. (Juli, 2021)
